sentence.Network_en: They've stored their furniture in a pantechnicon while they go abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们出国时把家具送到仓库保管起来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from pan- 'all' + tekhnikon 'piece of art', originally the name of a bazaar in London for all kinds of artistic work, later converted into a furniture warehouse

means.word_mean: 1. a large moving van (especially one used for moving furniture)
